tool_description: Get reliable and accurate Football Livescore API feed from us. We allow developers to integrate Football Livescore API’s to mobile applications and websites
name: ApiFootball
title: ApiFootball

api_list.name: Players

optional_parameters.name: player_name
optional_parameters.description: Player Name - mandatory if player id is not set

optional_parameters.name: player_id
optional_parameters.description: Player ID - mandatory if player name is not set

api_list.name: Standings
api_list.description: Returns standings for leagues included in your current subscription plan

api_list.name: Countries
api_list.description: Returns list of supported countries included in your current subscription plan

api_list.name: Competitions
api_list.description: Returns list of supported competitions included in your current subscription plan

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: Country ID - if set only leagues from specific country will be returned (Optional)

api_list.name: Teams

optional_parameters.name: team_id
optional_parameters.description: Team ID - team id mandatory if league id is not set

optional_parameters.name: league_id
optional_parameters.description: League ID - league id mandatory if team id is not set

api_list.name: Events (Results / Fixtures)
api_list.description: Returns events included in your current subscription plan

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: Country ID - if set only leagues from specific country will be returned (Optional)

optional_parameters.name: league_id
optional_parameters.description: League ID - if set events from specific league will be returned (Optional)

optional_parameters.name: match_id
optional_parameters.description: Match ID - if set only details from specific match will be returned (Optional)

optional_parameters.name: team_id
optional_parameters.description: Team ID - if set only details from specific team will be returned (Optional)

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Start date (yyyy-mm-dd)

optional_parameters.name: timezone
optional_parameters.description: Default timezone: Europe/Berlin. With this filter you can set the timezone where you want to receive the data. Timezone is in TZ format (exemple: America/New_York)

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: Stop date (yyyy-mm-dd)

api_list.name: Lineups
Statistics
Odds
api_list.description: Returns odds (1x2, BTS, O/U, AH) for events included in your current subscription plan

optional_parameters.name: match_id
optional_parameters.description: Match ID - if set only odds from specific event will be returned (Optional)

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: Stop date (yyyy-mm-dd)

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Start date (yyyy-mm-dd)

api_list.name: H2H
api_list.description: Returns the last games between submiteted teams and the last games of each team

optional_parameters.name: secondTeam
optional_parameters.description: Second team name

optional_parameters.name: firstTeam
optional_parameters.description: First team name

optional_parameters.name: timezone
optional_parameters.description: Default timezone: Europe/Berlin. With this filter you can set the timezone where you want to receive the data. Timezone is in TZ format (exemple: America/New_York). (Optional)

api_list.name: Predictions
api_list.description: Returns mathematical calculated predictions for the events included in your current subscription plan

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: Stop date (yyyy-mm-dd)

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: Country ID - if set only leagues from specific country will be returned (Optional)

optional_parameters.name: match_id
optional_parameters.description: Match ID - if set only details from specific match will be returned (Optional)

optional_parameters.name: league_id
optional_parameters.description: League ID - if set events from specific league will be returned (Optional)

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Start date (yyyy-mm-dd)

api_list.name: Livescore
api_list.description: Returns events live included in your current subscription plan
